review: Only reason I didn't give a 5 was a 4 1/2 star want an option. Only issue I have is i have to plug into electrical outlet and not just the HDMI port because it stops playing and we have to restart the fire stick .
author: sofizzle9976

review: Excellent Little Device. If you have Prime and watch any of the Prime Shows, you definitely need to get this.I got it when Amazon partnered with Sling TV. It is a great way to watch. Highly recommended
author: Steven Lu

review: Great product with only minor problems but fixable. Thanks for prompt shipping and careful packing.
author: William DeChick

review: I love Amazon Fire TV Stick. It's so convenient to be able to have Netflix and other apps right on my TV!
author: Ashley

review: I have the stick and the fire....love them both!!!
